# The `DWARFLinkerBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

The base interface for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarflinker">DWARFLinker</a> implementations.

Definition at line 74 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h">DWARFLinkerBase.h</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h">DWARFLinkerBase.h</a>.

### addObjectFile() {#a1cd1c06e048565246194a799ecbc9486}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::DWARFLinkerBase::addObjectFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarffile">DWARFFile</a> &amp; File, <a href="#abdf3094623b3752dabeeb5bd7ceb24ad">ObjFileLoaderTy</a> Loader=nullptr, <a href="#a537122974e714f93e8ad5fa29439e856">CompileUnitHandlerTy</a> OnCUDieLoaded=&#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &amp;) &#123;&#125;)</>}>
Add an object file to be linked.

Pre-load compile unit die. Call <code>OnCUDieLoaded</code> for each compile unit die. If <code>File</code> has reference to a Clang module and UpdateIndexTablesOnly == false then the module is be pre-loaded by <code>Loader</code>.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
a call to setNoODR(true) and/or <a href="#a84197c8fcb9b0eaec294a800bdfa6f69">setUpdateIndexTablesOnly(bool Update)</a> must be made when required.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h/#l00104">104</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h">DWARFLinkerBase.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### link() {#a5c06ee4a3b2d38bf3fc825fc74580383}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Error llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::DWARFLinkerBase::link ()</>}>
Link the debug info for all object files added through calls to addObjectFile.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h/#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/dwarflinkerbase-h">DWARFLinkerBase.h</a>.
